commandDescription: Create a Package XML file and/or Destructive XML file(s) from several package or destructive files.
outputPathFlagDescription: Path to save the generated files. By default is your manifest folder
deleteBeforeFlagDescription: Option to create the Descructive XML file to deploy it before package file (delete files before deploy new changes insted delete files after deploy changes).
byTypeFlagDescription: Merge packages by type, that is, the package XML files into ine package xml file and destructive files into one destructive. Default option.
onlyPackageFlagDescription: Merge only the package XML files into one package XML file
onlyDestructiveFlagDescription: Merge only the destructive XML files into one destructive XML file
fullPackageFlagDescription: Merge all package and destructive XML files into one package XML file
fullDestructiveFlagDescription: Merge all package and destructive XML files into one destructive XML file
useIgnoreFlagDescription: Option to ignore the metadata included in ignore file from the package
ignoreFileFlagDescription: Path to the ignore file. Use this if you don't want to use the project root ignore file or has a different name.
ignoreDestructiveFlagDescription: Option to ignore metadata from destructive changes created file
destructiveIgnoreFileFlagDescription: Path to use different ignore file to ignore destructive changes instead the ignore file to ignore changes to deploy
sourceFlagDescription: Paths to the package XML and/or Destructive XML files separated by commas
lessThanTwoPathsError: To merge package files you must select at least two files to merge
